item.title: 1jan2025
item.description:
Today aside from an easy leetcode problem, studied knapsack problem - DP, solved a couple.

  • Stuck on a leetcode hard problem (two infact)

  • https://leetcode.com/problems/partition-array-into-two-arrays-to-minimize-sum-difference

    • need to figure out a memoized/tabulation solution for above.

  • https://leetcode.com/problems/partition-to-k-equal-sum-subsets/description/

    • no idea about the solution.

  • Spring auth

    • found out books about learning spring security in depth:
    • Book is : Spring Boot in Practice - Somnath Musib
    • Other really in depth book about spring security is Spring Security in action
    • All books: here
